C

ChangeView - Class in Controller
The ChangeView class which manages the changing of views between screens, and simplifies the application by preventing redundant code in each controller class.
ChangeView() - Constructor for class Controller.ChangeView
 
changeViewToAdd(ActionEvent, String) - Method in class Controller.ChangeView
changeViewToAdd method to change view to specified screen
changeViewToMain(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ChangeView
changeViewToMain method used to redirect the user back to the Main Menu
changeViewToModify(ActionEvent, String, TableView) - Method in class Controller.ChangeView
changeViewToModify method to change view to specified screen facilitates passing of part/product data to text fields
companyCheck(TextField) - Method in class Controller.FormValidation
Company Check method which validates the user input for the Company Name Text Field
confirmDelete(String) - Method in class Controller.AlertHandler
Confirm delete method which asks the user to confirm the deletion
Controller - package Controller
